summary: This document is a mortgage loan application correspondence addressed to Brian Vickers from Joann Brown, a mortgage loan originator. It includes a request for Vickers to review the enclosed documents related to his mortgage application and provides contact information for further inquiries.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the recipient of the mortgage loan application correspondence, indicating he is applying for a mortgage loan.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the sender of the correspondence, providing assistance regarding the mortgage loan application process.

keyFacts: The document is a mortgage loan application correspondence dated October 8, 2014.
Brian Vickers is applying for a mortgage loan.
Joann Brown is the mortgage loan originator assisting with the application.
The correspondence includes a request for Vickers to review enclosed documents.
Contact information for Joann Brown is provided for further inquiries.
